author: kfujino
msg: Reduce unnecessary nesting for acquisition of cluster instance.

author: kwright
msg: Better way to handle upgrade exceptions

author: rjollos
msg: 0.8dev: Exclude functional test cases when executing `python setup.py test` or `python -m tests.__init__`. Refs #624.

author: sijie
msg: BOOKKEEPER-698: Bookie client closure is not considering timeoutExecutor (rakesh via sijie)

author: rjollos
msg: 0.8dev: Isolate import of `unittest2` module to a single location.

The comparision `sys.version < (2, 7)`  in `tests.core` was incorrect (the correct comparision is `sys.version_info < (2, 7)`). To simplify things, we import `unittest2 as unittest` in `tests.__init__` and import unittest from `tests` everywhere else.
